summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Othello Street, from Rainier Avenue to 44th Avenue South; all in The City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6871 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds", and declaring an emergency.
